job.title: Senior Android Engineer (Remote)
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
100% REMOTE
Title:
Software Android Engineer
Salary:
$140,000 - $170,000
Requirements:
5+ years software development with a strong focus in Android development
We are a SaaS healthcare technology company that has seen very constant growth for the past 5 years.
We are actively hiring a senior Android engineer with a passion for new product development. This position will develop and implement new product features. They will working with other engineers to innovate UX, develop prototypes, and write client side code to create fast, high volume production applications.
If you have this experience, please apply immediately. We are actively interviewing for this urgent opening.
Top Reasons to Work with Us
Competitive salary ($140k - $170k)
Work w/ Industry Pros who have a few impressive exits under their belts
Full Benefits (health, dental, vision, etc.)
Huge opportunity for career and personal growth
What You Need for this Position
5-10+ years software development
Android
Java
Kotlin is a plus
BS in CS (or related) is preferred
So, if you are a Senior Android Engineer (Remote) with experience, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Danny.Herries@Optello.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : DH1-1642234 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Danny Herries - Lead Recruiter - Optello
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
Optello is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
